comments.description: Dier goes into the book in what is the first yellow card of the game
Kane is desperate to catch Liverpool's Salah in the race for golden boot, but he won't do it like that - the England man has just hammered a shot off target.
Now Ali gets a booking as he checks Sterling and the visitors have a free kick.
